dublin_core.dcvalue: International guidelines recommend the use of angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors possibly in combination with other antihypertensive drugs to treat hypertension with associated risk factors
Current therapeutic research, clinical and experimental
Antihypertensive effect of zofenopril plus hydrochlorothiazide versus zofenopril monotherapy in patients with essential hypertension according to their cardiovascular risk level: A post hoc analysis.
